title: Break My Heart
author: Dua Lipa
lyrics:
[00:08.57] I've always been the one to say the first goodbye
[00:13.17] Had to love and lose a hundred million times
[00:17.54] Had to get it wrong to know just what I like
[00:22.87] Now I'm falling
[00:25.77] You say my name like I have never heard before
[00:30.18] I'm indecisive, but this time, I know for sure
[00:34.24] I hope I'm not the only one that feels it all
[00:39.74] Are you falling?
[00:42.48] Centre of attention
[00:43.96] You know you can get whatever you want from me
[00:48.12] Whenever you want it, baby
[00:50.77] It's you in my reflection
[00:52.62] I'm afraid of all the things it could do to me
[00:56.66] If I would've known it, baby
[00:58.60] I would've stayed at home
[01:01.47] 'Cause I was doing better alone
[01:02.93] But when you said, "Hello"
[01:05.56] I knew that was the end of it all
[01:07.27] I should've stayed at home
[01:09.71] 'Cause now there ain't no letting you go
[01:11.59] Am I falling in love with the one that could break my heart?
[01:16.84] Oh no, I was doing better alone
[01:19.83] But when you said, "Hello"
[01:22.57] I knew that was the end of it all
[01:24.22] I should've stayed at home
[01:26.83] 'Cause now there ain't no letting you go
[01:28.54] Am I falling in love with the one that could break my heart?
[01:34.95] 
[01:37.93] I wonder, when you go, if I stay on your mind
[01:42.39] Two can play that game, but you win me every time
[01:46.59] Everyone before you was a waste of time
[01:51.89] Yeah, you got me
[01:54.56] Centre of attention
[01:56.36] You know you can get whatever you want from me
[02:00.33] Whenever you want it, baby
[02:02.94] It's you in my reflection
[02:04.84] I'm afraid of all the things it could do to me
[02:08.92] If I would've known it, baby
[02:10.87] I would've stayed at home
[02:13.68] 'Cause I was doing better alone
[02:15.20] But when you said, "Hello"
[02:17.84] I knew that was the end of it all
[02:19.40] I should've stayed at home
[02:22.17] 'Cause now there ain't no letting you go
[02:23.96] Am I falling in love with the one that could break my heart?
[02:29.07] Oh no, I was doing better alone
[02:32.17] But when you said, "Hello"
[02:34.63] I knew that was the end of it all
[02:36.30] I should've stayed at home
[02:39.03] 'Cause now there ain't no letting you go
[02:40.90] Am I falling in love with the one that could break my heart?
[02:46.32] (Ooh, break my heart)
[02:50.53] (Ooh, break my heart)
[02:54.74] (Ooh)
[02:57.74] Am I falling in love with the one that could break my heart?
[03:03.91] I would've stayed at home
[03:06.86] 'Cause I was doing better alone
[03:08.48] But when you said, "Hello"
[03:11.06] I knew that was the end of it all
[03:12.49] I should've stayed at home (I would've stayed at home 'cause I)
[03:15.27] 'Cause now there ain't no letting you go
[03:16.95] Am I falling in love with the one that could break my heart?
[03:22.38] Oh, no (oh no), I was doing better alone
[03:25.34] But when you said, "Hello"
[03:27.72] I knew that was the end of it all
[03:29.42] I should've stayed at home
[03:32.08] 'Cause now there ain't no letting you go
[03:33.87] Am I falling in love with the one that could break my heart?
[03:38.70]
